comments.author: Joeyp
comments.body: The thread subject is not right, better would be - Maximizing Losses through Multi-Asset TradingMulti asset trading is not good idea.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Move this topic to service discussion. Your site is new and your domain name was created in just 2 months ago. I click on your website and only what I was able to click on there is the white paper which I did not yet read because there is nothing I was able to click other than that and it is discouraging. The website needs development. I do not think what you want to do can be allowed by the government. I have not seen a site which can let you trade stock, crypto and forex together in multi-asset mode.In crypto, we have multi-asset mode where you can use many cryptoito open a position and I prefer that.
